snippet: Mitch White, a former N.F.L. player, must learn to adjust his life to the effects of a brain injury. He joins more than 3,000 players suing the N.F.L. over concussions.
abstract: Profile of Mitch White, a former NFL player who is dealing with long-term effects of brain injury; White is one of more than 3,000 players suing the NFL over concussions.
lead_paragraph: Mitch White, a former N.F.L. player, must learn to adjust his life to the effects of a brain injury. He joins more than 3,000 players suing the N.F.L. over concussions.

headline.seo: Former N.F.L. Player Mitch White Learns to Adjust To Postconcussion Life
headline.main: A Player’s Concussion, a Family’s Ordeal
headline.print_headline: A Player’s Concussion, A Family’s Ordeal
